channel.title: Multi-Threaded Connections
channel.description: I'm having more issues with this chat client I'm making, the biggest being that multiple clients can't connect to the same Input and OutputStreams in the server (I'm pretty sure this is the problem). I've tried [i]many[/i] tutorials, and none of them have helped my problem. If someone could just tell me the answer or point me in the right direction, thanks. I'm about to die of tiredness, 'night. XD

item.title: Multi-Threaded Connections
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Freak Teh Freak
item.description:
@Teh_Freak wrote:

The only way i can think of, is to create the ‘Main’ class, and then extend off of it like a ‘hack’, or something, and declare a new instance every time you want to load it, and have a class for dataIn and another for dataOut, and queue everything so it doesnt try to spit everything out at once, at least, thats how i did it for my java irc bot.
